author: cnbc.com
title: Jason Leverant Named to Staffing Industry Analysts' Staffing 100 List
text:
KNOXVILLE, Tenn., Feb. 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Jason Leverant, president and COO of AtWork Group, a rapidly growing national staffing franchise, has been named to the 2018 Staffing Industry Analysts Staffing 100 ranking, marking his fifth consecutive year of being recognized in the prestigious list.
Compiled by Staffing Industry Analysts (SIA), a global advisor on staffing and workforce solutions, the Staffing 100 list is not a ranking but a way to recognize leaders for the impact they make in a variety of ways across the workforce solutions ecosystem. The expertise of those included on the list encompasses that of CEOs, entrepreneurs, technologists, workforce specialists, data scientists, and more from a variety of different companies and lines of service.
Nominees were chosen after a rigorous review of candidates suggested by individuals, colleagues, and other industry sources.
"It's truly an honor to be recognized as one of the staffing industry's 100 most influential people," said Leverant. "My focus has always been to make an impact in the staffing industry for the good in order to strengthen the industry overall. I look forward to continuing to offer my insights as a thought leader in the future and fulfilling our company's mission: to be AtWork For You, all of my fellow staffing professionals!"
Leverant joined AtWork in 2007 as Vice President of Sales and moved into his current position in 2012. As president and COO of AtWork Group, Leverant spends his days gathering valuable insights while engaging directly with AtWork's branch owners, managers, and staff, helping to set the vision for the company and power AtWork's continued exponential growth. In 2017, under Leverant's leadership, AtWork once again experienced double-digit year-over-year growth, while also entering 17 new markets nationally.
AtWork provides companies with flexible employment solutions with the highest level of service possible and was recently ranked No. 88 in Entrepreneur Magazine's Franchise 500Â® ranking and No. 18 in the Franchise Times Fast & Serious list. The company also received a Franchise Times Top 200+ ranking five years in a row, and Staffing Industry Analysts (SIA) recognized AtWork as being one of the largest staffing companies based on revenues, as well as one of the fastest-growing staffing firms in the U.S. In 2017, Inc. Magazine ranked AtWork on its Inc. 5000 annual list for the fourth consecutive year, placing the company at No. 2,790.
The North American Staffing 100 list can be found at http://si100.staffingindustry.com/
For more information about franchise opportunities, visit www.atworkfranchise.com or call 888-553-1745.
About AtWork Group
AtWork Group is an award-winning and nationally-known franchisor of staffing services including AtWork Personnel Services, AtWork Medical Services, AtWork HelpingHands Services, and AtWork Search Group under the umbrella of the AtWork Group. The company was founded in 1986, and today, AtWork has grown to be cited as one of Staffing Industry Analysts' top U.S. staffing firms. AtWork Group's remarkable growth is fueled by the vision of founders John and Glenda Hall: think ahead, create opportunity, give exceptional support to franchise offices, and always look for the better way, every day. For more information, visit www.atwork.com or call 800-383-0804.
